actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 35 of title 38 of the United States Code to provide educational assistance thereunder to war orphans and widows for farm cooperative training.

summary.text: Provides educational assistance to war orphans and widows of veterans for farm cooperative training consisting of institutional agricultural courses pre-scheduled to fall within a forty-four week period of any consecutive months whether it is pursued on a full, three-quarter, or half time basis. (Amends 36 U.S.C. 1723, 1732)

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 35 of title 38 of the United States Code to provide educational assistance thereunder to war orphans and widows for farm cooperative training.
